skills.skill: Healthcare Construction (OSHPD1 or OSHPD3 or RCAI)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Enforce safety policies, meet with OSHA representatives, and implement safety procedures.
Review and comment on project schedule, and enforce critical sequences necessary to complete projects.

Create detailed RFIs with several proposed solutions, lead/delegate/coordinate RFIs with clients/architects/engineers, and review field tickets for accuracy against contract documents and scopes of work.
Review and confirm work is being installed according to the project scope at the trade level and meets applicable codes, schedules, and coordinates subcontractors/vendors/site trades.
Develop daily clean-up plans across all trades, audit non-negotiables and quality control plan, decide what finishes to protect, and ensure finishes are protected by company standards.
Complete punchlist and ensure completion before starting the next project, understand attic stock requirements and ensure materials are delivered to the site on time.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree with concentration in construction, engineering, or business strongly preferred, or additional work experience in lieu of a degree.
